"SIEMENS SUBSCRIBER NETWORKS", "2004", "034-4240-002", :and "(Rev B)" is etched onto the bottom of the board. '''[[Askey]]''' is presumed to manufacture this device. *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/siemens-speedstream-4100-adsl122-router-318 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== 
                         J1
